metadata.name: SILENTIUM
metadata.description:
SILENTIUM is a poetic artwork that uses symbolism to illustrate how it feels to be in a situation where you are unable to speak or see your own truth. Hence, only seeing and saying what the world wants us to see and say.

"
i am lost
not in destination but in mind
i am cold
not in the absence of clothing but in heart

there is an emptiness in my voice
there is no direction in my poise
there is sound but i hear no noise
there is anquish in my own choice 

where am i
there is a hand that leads me
how are i
there is a hand that mutes me

my fear is not my own
my joy belongs to another
a question of what i am
a silent sheep that follows
"

Dimensions: 3456 x 5184 px

The first collector of the artwork will receive two additional NFT's, a poem, and an animated 3D render of SILENTIUM.
